# MKMarkerAnnotationView

**Class**

An annotation view that displays a balloon-shaped marker at the designated location.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class MKMarkerAnnotationView
```

## Overview

Return an instance of this class from the [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKMapViewDelegate/mapView(_:viewFor:)-8humz] method of your map view delegate when you want to display the same types of markers used in the Maps app.

The default [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKAnnotationView/displayPriority] for an instance of this class is [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKFeatureDisplayPriority/defaultLow].

## Setting the Marker Color

- **markerTintColor**: The background color of the marker balloon.

## Setting the Marker Content

- **glyphText**: The text to display in the marker balloon.
- **glyphImage**: An image to display in the marker balloon.
- **glyphTintColor**: The color to apply to the glyph text or image.
- **selectedGlyphImage**: An image to display when the user selects the marker.

## Setting the Visibility

- **titleVisibility**: The visibility of the title text rendered beneath the marker balloon.
- **subtitleVisibility**: The visibility of the subtitle text rendered beneath the marker balloon.
- **MKFeatureVisibility**: Constants that indicate the visibility of different map features.

## Animating the Marker onto the Screen

- **animatesWhenAdded**: A Boolean that indicates whether the marker animates into position onscreen.

## Location annotations

- **Annotating a Map with Custom Data**: Annotate a map with location-specific data using default and customized annotation views and callouts.
- **MKPointAnnotation**: A string-based piece of location-specific data that you apply to a specific point on a map.
- **MKMapItemAnnotation**: An annotation that represents a map item
- **MKPinAnnotationView**: An annotation view that displays a pin image on the map.
